text: Philippa Scott (born November 10, 1935) is an American actress. Her movie credits include The Searchers (1956), As Young as We Are (1958), Auntie Mame (1958), Quick, Let's Get Married (1964), Petulia (1968), Some Kind of a Nut (1969), Cold Turkey (1971) and Bad Ronald (1974). Scott has also appeared in television shows such as Maverick, Mr. Lucky, The Alaskans, The DuPont Show with June Allyson, The Twilight Zone, Thriller, F Troop, Have Gun â€“ Will Travel, Redigo, The Tall Man, The Dick Van Dyke Show, The Rat Patrol, Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C., Gunsmoke, The Virginian, Perry Mason, The Fugitive, The Mary Tyler Moore Show, The Waltons, Columbo and Jigsaw John. Scott was born in Los Angeles, California. She is the daughter of actress Laura Straub and screenwriter Allan Scott. She was married to producer Lee Rich from 1964 until their divorce in 1983. The couple had two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Pippa Scott
